Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • People
        • Customer
  • public class Customer
extends People
    The code for all of the customers actions

    • Moves to door when they haven't ordered
    • Ignores door when there are a lot of customers in the store
    • Checks for and moves to open cashier
    • Places an order when the order can be fulfilled
    • Checks for and moves to open waiting line
    • Picks up the correct pizza and leaves the store
    Version:
    (a version number or a date)
    Author:
    (your name)

      void pizzaPickup()
      checks for all the pizzas at the counter, picks up the one that matches their order
